data.name: Seattle GNU/Linux (aka SeaGL)
data.description: SeaGL is a grassroots technical conference dedicated to spreading awareness and knowledge about the GNU/Linux community and free/libre/open-source software/hardware.

relatedRecords.name: AllThingsRTC 2020
relatedRecords.description: The Agora AllThingsRTC 2020 event will take place at the Metreon City View in San Francisco on August 27. Submit to the AllThingsRTC 2020 Conference Call for Papers and become a recognized expert in Real-Time Communications (RTC).

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
relatedRecords.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year!
